SystemOverview: The system is experiencing performance degradation primarily due to CPU utilization spikes that correlate with increased error rates and service bottlenecks during peak load times.

RecommendedActions: ["Investigate and optimize CPU usage in the auth-service to handle peak loads more effectively.", "Perform a detailed memory profiling on the payments-service to identify and fix potential memory leaks.", "Implement rate limiting and backpressure strategies to manage the load on critical services during peak times.", "Review and optimize long-running spans in distributed traces to reduce latency and improve overall performance."]
